column4: anyone here have a G5 with breezy and usplash working properly?

yes, and it was an adventure. it wanst seen as "bootable" by the machine, and when i restarted in OSX, it kernel panicked it immediately. hadda go to OF to eject the thing
Hrmm, dunno.
too late
i'm runnin a dual 1.8 and i have 0 problems
the 1.6 was the first model, and has "original model year bugs"
good for you, I've got 100 macs with no problems and 30 with severe problems.
are you a sysadmin in heaven?
a 50+% mortality rate on motherboard/cpu in the first year is a bit more than a bug
well then, i'm past that (bought a apple warranted refurb)
AppleCare IMO is pretty good, but if they don't comp us another 2 years of AppleCare on the 1.6's it may be the last Mac lab we have
really. . . .
my DP1.8 is amazingly faster than my G3 and G4 ibooks (both maxxed with ram)
emachine? we are comparing apples and prunes now?
